Title: Relates to a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on certain premises
Summary: Relates to authorizing a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on-premises, notwithstanding certain restrictions regarding proximity to a school, church, synagogue, or other place of worship, for certain property located in the county of Erie.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on certain premises
